title: Multimedia-Based University Self-Directed Learning Enhancement Program: Application in Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A self-directed learning environment utilizing multimedia content (videos, interactive quizzes, simulations) accessible via individual mobile devices, supplemented by biweekly offline feedback sessions.

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously analyze and solve complex mathematical problems with a strategy application accuracy of over 80% within six months
Learners can self-directly plan and execute a weekly study schedule of over 10 hours using multimedia learning materials
Learners can record reflections in a journal documenting improvements to their learning strategies every two weeks based on formative assessment results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
